chance.name: Advance to Illinois
chance.text: Advance to Illinois Avenue. If you pass Go, collect $200

chance.name: Advance to St. Charles Place
chance.text: Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go, collect $200

chance.name: Advance to Nearest Railroad
chance.text: Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled

chance.name: Advance to Nearest Railroad
chance.text: Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled

chance.name: Advance to Nearest Utility
chance.text: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times amount thrown.

chance.name: Go to jail
chance.text: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail, do not pass Go, do not collect $200

chance.name: General Repairs
chance.text: Make general repairs on all your property. For each house pay $25. For each hotel pay $100

chance.name: Advance to Reading Railroad
chance.text: Take a trip to Reading Railroad. If you pass Go, collect $200

chance.name: Elected Chairman
chance.text: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50

community chest.name: Bank Error
community chest.text: Bank error in your favor. Collect $200

community chest.name: Stock Earning
community chest.text: From sale of stock you get $50

community chest.name: Go to jail
community chest.text: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail, do not pass Go, do not collect $200

community chest.name: It's your birthday
community chest.text: It is your birthday. Collect $10 from every player

community chest.name: Street Repair
community chest.text: You are assessed for street repair. $40 per house. $115 per hotel

community chest.name: Second in Beauty Contest
community chest.text: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10
